Name: FAWE: Enchanted Forest
About the game: FAWE: Enchanted Forest - board card game about mystical forest where magic has been saved. Fight 3 or 4 Players in FFA or Teamplay mode on 1 Board with unlimited amount of Cards of 5 types - 4 Base Cards and 1 Super Card. Every Card has Attack and Defense and gives Buffs and Debuffs. In addition Super Card gives you ability to Upskill.
